Message:
On our way to our next destination,
we came across some refugees
being chased by cursed creatures.

A young girl—about the
same age as my little fan—
was being chased by a creature.

...I’m sure if I use my magical
power, I can save her.

Ignoring my troupemates’ warnings,
I unleashed my full potential
for the very first time.

A large target.
No need to aim.

As I watch the creature
fall to the ground,
I let my fate play out
in my head.

I’m sure someone’ll call
the Knights of Longinus,
and I’ll be captured
in an instant...

The least I can do is make sure
I don’t cause trouble for anyone.
